Text.val: 12.07.2011 GB SCR16616 Changed value of PI.USRID in the A - Populate MQ 123
03.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
04.05.2009 SH SCR14596 Fixed bug to set MQDT_TEXT(3) to 1 (was always set)
Furthermore I fixed multiple bugs according to the access of tables
-- If V.WORKINGDAY <> 5 then close the program without updates

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count (*) from :1/CALD where YEAR (CALD_DATE) = :2 and MONTH (CALD_DATE) = :3 and DAY (CALD_DATE) <= :4

select CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN where CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGS > 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and (CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ = 1 or CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ = 3 and month (':2') in (1,4,7,10))
select max (CDOV_OVERDRAWINGAGREED) from :1/CDOV where CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CDOV_DATE between ':4' and ':5'
